TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFormattable

summary.span: 提供將物件的值格式化成以字串表示的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to format the value of an object into a string representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面將物件轉換為其根據格式字串和格式提供者的字串表示。The interface converts an object to its string representation based on a format string and a format provider. 格式字串通常會定義物件的一般的外觀。A format string typically defines the general appearance of an object. 例如，.NET Framework 支援以下功能：For example, the .NET Framework supports the following: - 格式設定列舉值的標準格式字串 (請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md))。Standard format strings for formatting enumeration values (see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)). - 標準和自訂格式字串來格式化數字值 (請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md))。Standard and custom format strings for formatting numeric values (see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)). - 用來格式化日期和時間值的標準和自訂格式字串 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))。Standard and custom format strings for formatting date and time values (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). - 標準和自訂格式字串來格式化時間間隔 (請參閱[標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md))。Standard and custom format strings for formatting time intervals (see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)). 您也可以定義自己的格式字串，以支援您的應用程式定義類型的格式。You can also define your own format strings to support formatting of your application-defined types. 格式提供者傳回格式化的物件，通常會使用符號定義中將物件轉換為其字串表示。A format provider returns a formatting object that typically defines the symbols used in converting an object to its string representation. 比方說，當您將數字轉換成貨幣值時，格式提供者會定義顯示的貨幣符號結果字串中。For example, when you convert a number to a currency value, a format provider defines the currency symbol that appears in the result string. .NET Framework 會定義三個格式提供者：The .NET Framework defines three format providers: - 類別，會傳回物件格式化數值，或格式化日期和時間值的物件。The class, which returns either a object for formatting numeric values, or a object for formatting date and time values. - 類別，它會傳回本身的執行個體，用來格式化數字值。The class, which returns an instance of itself for formatting numeric values. - 類別，它會傳回本身的執行個體，用來格式化日期和時間值。The class, which returns an instance of itself for formatting date and time values. 此外，您可以定義自己的自訂格式提供者，提供特定文化特性，行業特有的或格式會使用業界的特定資訊。In addition, you can define your own custom format providers to supply culture-specific, profession-specific, or industry-specific information used in formatting. 如需有關如何實作使用自訂的格式提供者的自訂格式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about implementing custom formatting by using a custom format provider, see . 介面會定義單一方法，提供格式化服務的實作類型。The interface defines a single method, , that supplies formatting services for the implementing type. 直接呼叫方法。The method can be called directly. 此外，它就會呼叫自動和方法，以及使用方法[複合格式功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md).NET Framework 中。In addition, it is called automatically by the and methods, and by methods that use the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) in the .NET Framework. 這類方法包括， ，和，和其他項目。Such methods include , , and , among others. 方法呼叫方法的格式字串中的每個格式項目。The method is called for each format item in the method's format string. 介面的實作方法的基底資料型別。The interface is implemented by the base data types. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface. 此類別支援四個格式規範:"G"和"C"，表示溫度為攝氏; 顯示"F"，這表示溫度為顯示華氏;和"K"，這表示要顯示這個類別是溫度。The class supports four format specifiers: "G" and "C", which indicate that the temperature is to be displayed in Celsius; "F", which indicates that the temperature is to be displayed in Fahrenheit; and "K", which indicates that the temperature is to be displayed in Kelvin. 此外，實作也可以處理的格式字串`null`或空白。In addition, the implementation also can handle a format string that is `null` or empty. 其他兩個`ToString`所定義的方法`Temperature`類別只是呼叫包裝至實作。The other two `ToString` methods defined by the `Temperature` class simply wrap a call to the implementation. [!code-csharp[System.IFormattable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormattable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/vb/example1.vb#1)] 下列範例會接著呼叫實作直接或使用複合格式字串。The following example then calls the implementation either directly or by using a composite format string. [!code-csharp[System.IFormattable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormattable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/vb/example1.vb#2)]

para.span: 需要更多控制格式設定的字串比類別提供應該實作。

span.span: Classes that require more control over the formatting of strings than provides should implement .

para.span: 類別可實作必須支援"G"（一般） 格式規範。

span.span: A class that implements must support the "G" (general) format specifier.

para.span: "G"規範，除了類別可以定義它所支援的格式規範的清單。

span.span: Besides the "G" specifier, the class can define the list of format specifiers that it supports.

para.span: 此外，類別必須準備好處理格式規範所。

span.span: In addition, the class must be prepared to handle a format specifier that is .

para.span: 如需格式化和格式化程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)

span.span: For more information about formatting and formatting codes, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToString (string format, IFormatProvider formatProvider);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToString(string format, class System.IFormatProvider formatProvider) cil managed
Public Function ToString (format As String, formatProvider As IFormatProvider) As String
public: System::String ^ ToString(System::String ^ format, IFormatProvider ^ formatProvider);

param.name: format
param.span: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，用於使用針對 實作而定義的預設格式。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the implementation.

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 要用來格式化值的提供者。

span.span: The provider to use to format the value.

param.span: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，用於取得作業系統目前地區設定中的數值格式資訊。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式，格式化目前執行個體的值。

span.span: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.

returns.span: 採用指定格式之目前執行個體的值。

span.span: The value of the current instance in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將值轉換成可以多種方式表示的字串表示法。The method converts a value to a string representation that can be expressed in multiple ways. 其精確的格式取決於特定的符號或指定的順序，由特定文化特性、 專業人員或產業所定義。Its precise format depends on specific symbols or a specified order defined by specific cultures, professions, or industries. 您可以直接呼叫方法。You can call the method directly. 它也稱為自動和方法的方法，使用複合格式化的功能在.NET Framework 中，例如， ，和。It is also called automatically by the and methods, and by methods that use the composite formatting feature in the .NET Framework, such as , , and . (如需詳細資訊，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。)(For more information, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md).) 複合格式方法呼叫方法針對在格式字串中的每個格式項目執行一次。Composite formatting methods call the method once for each format item in a format string. 傳遞給方法的參數，如下所示依據特定的格式化方法之呼叫以及內容的格式項目：The parameters passed to the method depend on the specific formatting method that is called and on the content of the format item, as follows: - 如果格式項目不會包含格式字串 (例如，如果格式項目是單純`{0}`)，它會傳遞`null`做為值參數。If the format item does not include a format string (for example, if the format item is simply `{0}`), it is passed `null` as the value of the parameter. - 如果格式項目包含格式字串 (例如， `{0:G}`)，格式字串會傳遞做為值參數。If the format item includes a format string (for example, `{0:G}`), that format string is passed as the value of the parameter. - 如果不包含原始方法呼叫參數，傳遞的值為參數。If the original method call does not include an parameter, is passed as the value of the parameter. - 如果原始方法呼叫包含參數，方法呼叫中提供的提供者會傳遞做為值參數。If the original method call includes an parameter, the provider that is supplied in the method call is passed as the value of the parameter. > [!NOTE] > 物件的才並不會實作會呼叫複合格式方法格式提供者，或如果方法的自訂格式提供者會傳回`null`。An object's implementation is called by composite formatting methods only if they are not passed an format provider, or if the method of the custom format provider returns `null`. .NET Framework 包含三個格式提供者，其中實作介面：The .NET Framework includes three format providers, all of which implement the interface: - 提供數值格式資訊，例如用於十進位和群組分隔符號字元拼字和貨幣值中的貨幣符號的位置。 supplies numeric formatting information, such as the characters to use for decimal and group separators, and the spelling and placement of currency symbols in monetary values. - 提供相關的日期和時間相關格式資訊，例如月、 日和年的日期模式中的位置。 supplies date-related and time-related formatting information, such as the position of the month, the day, and the year in a date pattern. - 包含預設的格式化特定文化特性，包括數值格式資訊中的資訊和相關的日期和時間相關的格式資訊。 contains the default formatting information in a specific culture, including the numeric format information, and date-related and time-related formatting information. 此外，您可以定義自己的自訂格式提供者。In addition, you can define your own custom format provider. ## Examples 下列範例會示範`Temperature`類別可實作方法。The following example demonstrates a `Temperature` class that implements the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.IFormattable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormattable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iformattable/vb/example1.vb#1)]

span.span: The method must support the "G" (general) format specifier.

para.span: "G"規範，除了類別可以定義它所支援的格式規範的清單。

span.span: Besides the "G" specifier, the class can define the list of format specifiers that it supports.

para.span: 此外，類別必須準備好處理格式規範所。

span.span: In addition, the class must be prepared to handle a format specifier that is .

para.span: 如需格式化和格式化程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。
